## hpr1591 :: The Ultimate Cooking Device

 
Using a Weber grill to cook all your food.


Weber Grills: https://weber.com

Basic Grill Model: https://www.weber.com/grills/series/one-touch/one-touch-silver-225

Chimney: https://store.weber.com/accessories/category/cook/1466

Lighter Cubes: https://store.weber.com/accessories/category/cook/1324

Grate for use with a Wok: https://store.weber.com/accessories/category/cook/cookware/1390

https://alphageeks.libsyn.com/
